trans-unit.note: The text showed after enter the earth page
User welcome

trans-unit.source: Here I found star lights, sweet breezes...
trans-unit.target: ここには美しい星空が見える
trans-unit.note: The text showed in the progress the user scroll through the scroll scene
Scroll scene text

trans-unit.target: そのうえ、わくわくしてるこころだ
trans-unit.note: The text showed in the progress the user scroll through the scroll scene
Scroll scene text

trans-unit.source: Look, the shooting stars in the sky...
trans-unit.note: The text showed in the progress the user scroll through the scroll scene
Scroll scene text

trans-unit.target: そして、周りに奇妙な火垂るもいっぱい
trans-unit.note: The text showed in the progress the user scroll through the scroll scene
Scroll scene text

trans-unit.target: ちょっと、かぜが吹き始めてる
trans-unit.note: The text showed in the progress the user scroll through the scroll scene
Scroll scene text

trans-unit.source: Do you hear the breathe of the Earth?
trans-unit.target: この地球の呼吸が聞こえるか
